properties.areaDesc: Marengo, AL; Greene, AL; Hale, AL; Sumter, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 15 at 9:07AM CST until January 20 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the Tombigbee River At Bevill Lock
and Dam...
...The flood warning continues for the Tombigbee River At Gainesville
Lock and Dam...

.Heavy rainfall over the Tombigbee basin is continuing to produce
rises along the river...and a flood warning remains in effect.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Tombigbee River At Gainesville Lock and Dam.
* until late Sunday night...or until the warning is cancelled.
* At  8:45 AM Wednesday the stage was 108.1 feet.
* Flood stage is 101 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will continue rising to near 109.1 feet by
tomorrow morning . The river will fall below flood stage early
Sunday afternoon.
* Impact...At 109 feet...Flooding of some camps and cabins...as well
as widespread flooding of low-lying woods and agricultural lands...
occurs, especially ustream of the lock and dam.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Thursday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
